fields_of_interest: Competition, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport

goals__remit:
GovStrat is a technology & digital consulting firm providing customized technology strategy and consulting services. 
 
We are specialized in helping SMEs to manage their intellectual property licensing (including SEPs valuation) and standardization strategy.
relevant_communication: General framework of European standardisation policy, Intellectual property rights (IPRs) for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs)
